text:
WH Press Sec: “Pres Trump has repeatedly said that Americans should consult w/...doctors regarding coronavirus treatment...Leave it to the media to irresponsibly take President Trump out of context."

Note: Trump asked on video about injecting disinfectants & light into bodies. https://t.co/G0l6NiXMeb
